goal.ch: 「生命」與「生活」本質上是兩個不同的主題。「生命」可以用科學去驗證，「生活」則需要融合知識與經驗去理解。就讀生命科學系的學生，對於生活的理解，在知識上具備了優勢。本課程的目標，在於啟發學生將所學的知識，結合經驗，用於對生活的理解。以期年輕學子，可以更真實的面對人生這個大哉問，也讓自己的人生更豐富精彩。
goal.en: The essence of ‘life‘ and ‘living‘ fundamentally represents two distinct subjects. ‘Life‘ can be scientifically verified, while ‘living‘ requires the integration of knowledge and experience for comprehension. Students majoring in life sciences possess an advantage in understanding life on a knowledge-based level. The goal of this course is to inspire students to synergize their acquired knowledge with life experiences, fostering a deeper understanding of living. It aims to empower young learners to confront the profound question of life more authentically, enriching and enhancing the vibrancy of their own life journeys.
